verses.text: \w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w*: Nehemiah \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governor|strong="H8269"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Hacaliah, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Zedekiah,
Maaziah, Bilgai, Shemaiah; these were \w the|strong="H4918"\w* priests.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* Levites: namely, Jeshua \w the|strong="H3548"\w* son \w of|strong="H3548"\w* Azaniah, Binnui \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3548"\w* Henadad, Kadmiel;
\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3881"\w* brethren, Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
\w The|strong="H1137"\w* chiefs of \w the|strong="H1137"\w* people: Parosh, Pahath-moab, Elam, Zattu, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4409"\w* \w the|strong="H1196"\w* rest of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* people, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* priests, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* Levites, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* porters, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* singers, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* Nethinim, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* all they that had separated themselves from \w the|strong="H1196"\w* peoples of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* lands unto \w the|strong="H1196"\w* law of God, their wives, their sons, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* their daughters, everyone that had knowledge, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* understanding;

\w they|strong="H5971"\w* clave \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brethren, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* nobles, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* entered \w into|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w into|strong="H1323"\w* \w an|strong="H5971"\w* oath, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* walk \w in|strong="H1121"\w* God’s \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* given \w by|strong="H3605"\w* Moses \w the|strong="H3605"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w observe|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commandments \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ordinances \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* statutes;

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* daughters \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, nor \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* daughters \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons;

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* wares \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* grain \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* sabbath day \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w sell|strong="H5414"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w buy|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* sabbath, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy day; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* forego \w the|strong="H5414"\w* seventh \w year|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* exaction \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3947"\w* debt.

\w Also|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H8141"\w* ordinances \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*, \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w charge|strong="H3027"\w* ourselves \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* third \w part|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shekel \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*;

\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* showbread, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* continual meal offering, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* continual burnt offering, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sabbaths, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* new moons, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* feasts, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holy \w things|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin offerings \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* atonement \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* cast lots, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Levites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* bring \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* fathers’ \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w times|strong="H4150"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w*, year \w by|strong="H5921"\w* year, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* burn \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* ground, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* manner \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*;

\w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* cattle, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* written \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstlings \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* herds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* flocks, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests \w that|strong="H3605"\w* minister \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*;

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3548"\w* bring \w the|strong="H3548"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our dough, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* our heave offerings, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H1121"\w* all manner \w of|strong="H1121"\w* trees, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* new wine \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* oil, \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* chambers \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* tithes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our ground \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w Levites|strong="H1121"\w*; \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3789"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w Levites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w take|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* tithes \w in|strong="H1004"\w* all \w the|strong="H3548"\w* cities \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our tillage.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w when|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w take|strong="H6237"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H3881"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w unto|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, \w into|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* treasure \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3881"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* heave \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* grain, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* new wine, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* oil, \w unto|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* minister, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* porters, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* singers: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* forsake \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* God.
